title: Psalms 132:1
text: LORD, remember David, and all his afflictions:

title: Psalms 132:2
text: How he sware unto the LORD, and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob;

title: Psalms 132:3
text: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;

title: Psalms 132:4
text: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, or slumber to mine eyelids,

title: Psalms 132:5
text: Until I find out a place for the LORD, an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob.

title: Psalms 132:6
text: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.

title: Psalms 132:7
text: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.

title: Psalms 132:8
text: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.

title: Psalms 132:9
text: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.

title: Psalms 132:10
text: For thy servant David's sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.

title: Psalms 132:11
text: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.

title: Psalms 132:12
text: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.

title: Psalms 132:13
text: For the LORD hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.

title: Psalms 132:14
text: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.

title: Psalms 132:15
text: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.

title: Psalms 132:16
text: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.

title: Psalms 132:17
text: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.

title: Psalms 132:18
text: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
